content:
The build of https://github.com/HL7/fhir-for-fair/tree/ballot-wip on build.fhir.org fails with this sushi error "Failed to load hl7.fhir.r4b.core#4.1.0"

I've not this problem in my local build.

Suggestions are welcomed :-)
try again. The packages server ran out of space trying to log the denial of service attack
Giorgio Cangioli has marked this topic as resolved.
